snippet: A legal battle by Haitian cholera epidemic victims to hold the United Nations accountable reached its highest level in an American court on Tuesday.
abstract: Federal appeals court hears arguments in case against United Nations on cholera outbreak in Haiti; organization's peacekeepers stand accused of bringing disease to country amid deployment for 2010 earthquake.
lead_paragraph: A legal battle by Haitian cholera epidemic victims to hold the United Nations accountable reached its highest level in an American court on Tuesday.

headline.main: Court Hears Suit Against U.N. on Haiti Cholera Outbreak
headline.print_headline: Court Hears Suit Against U.N. on Cholera Outbreak
